content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates; status: NO_FUEL; warning: "out of fuel"; source holds 48 units of iron ore.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) smelting copper ore into copper plates; status: NO_INGREDIENTS; fuel inventory contains coal (2 units) and furnace result holds 6 copper plates; energy: 1600.0.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) configured with 10 automation science packs (research: automation); status: NO_POWER; electrical_id updated to 5040.
- ElectricityGroup with id=5040 connecting small electric poles at positions (9.5, 6.5), (10.5, 7.5) and (8.5, 6.5) with voltage 0.

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(2.5, 21.5)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at position(2.5, 21.5) for power generation; status: NOT_CONNECTED; warnings: ["not connected to power network", "no input liquid", "no fluid present in connections"]; connection points: (5.0, 21.5) and (0.0, 21.5).
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) for steam production; status: NO_FUEL; warnings: ["out of fuel"]; fluid_box contains approximately 200 units of water at 15°; connection points: (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5); steam output point: (-7.5, 24.5); fluid_systems: [17652].
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) for water extraction; status: WORKING; connection point: (-9.5, 23.5); fluid_box holds 100 units of water at 15°; fluid_systems: [17652].
- Pipeline Network comprising:
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=17652 at position(-6.5, 20.5); status: WORKING.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=17653 at position(-2.5, 20.5); status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=17654 at position(-0.5, 21.5); status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=17659 at position(-3.5, 23.5); status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=17658 at position(-7.5, 25.5); status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=17663 at position(3.5, 25.5); status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=17662 at position(2.5, 24.5); status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=17665 at position(-0.5, 28.5); status: EMPTY.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
• Fluid System Connection Failures:
  - Repeated failed connection attempts were observed using PipeGroups with fluid_system IDs. Historical failures include IDs (16620, 16663, 16706, 16749, 16792, 16835, 16878, 16921; 16964, 17007, 17050, 17093, 17136, 17179, 17222, 17265) while recent attempts used IDs (17308, 17351, 17394, 17437, 17480, 17523, 17566, 17609). Ensure that each connection targets an existing, active PipeGroup with the correct fluid_system configuration.

• Inefficient Pipeline Stabilization:
  - Replace fixed wait intervals (10-second delays) with dynamic status checks to verify pipeline readiness prior to proceeding.
